function_description: Toggle sidebar size between compact and regular in 4ga Boards application.
initial_state: User is on the Preferences settings page of the 4ga Boards application with 'Compact Sidebar' currently set to Disabled.
steps: Locate the 'Compact Sidebar' section on the Preferences settings page.
Click on the toggle switch next to the 'Compact Sidebar' label.
expected_state: The sidebar of the 4ga Boards application is updated to a compact style, providing a minimalistic design and more room for lists in the board view.
